price: 85. Un jour, Nous rassemblerons les gens pieux en cortège devant le Tout Clément,
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
